feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 04:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
